PIN.values: |highlighting a specific chakra inside a specific sculpture (considering vertical position and color, just a few single LEDs are on)|
|full LED strip in the color of specific chakra (each sculpture different color)|
|all strips together where the light is passed from one sculpture to another|
|for example have a green HEART chakra in one sculpture and then to have it in all the other sculptures etc.|
|- 6 x APA102 LED strips 60pixel/meter&cr;&lf;serially connected in an array of 360 pixels in total&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;- Arduino MEGA 2560&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;- Kinect 2|
